industry_ecommerce.meta_title: E-commerce & Retail IT Solutions | Swiss Made IT
industry_ecommerce.meta_description: Fast, high-converting online stores and marketplaces. Headless architecture, integrations, analytics.

industry_ecommerce.cta_description: Free audit of your online store. We'll show conversion and loading speed growth points.

challenges.title: Conversion
challenges.description: Increasing the percentage of visitors who make a purchase.

challenges.title: Loading speed
challenges.description: Every second of delay reduces conversion by 7%.

challenges.title: Scaling
challenges.description: Handling peak loads during sales season without failures.

challenges.title: Omnichannel
challenges.description: Unified shopping experience online, in-app, and in-store.

solutions.title: Headless Commerce
solutions.description: Flexible architecture with frontend/backend separation for maximum speed.

solutions.title: Marketplaces
solutions.description: Multi-vendor platforms with moderation, ratings, and commissions.

solutions.title: B2B Portals
solutions.description: Wholesale platforms with personalized pricing, orders, and ERP integration.

solutions.title: Subscription Services
solutions.description: Recurring billing, subscription management, retention marketing.

case_study.challenge: Migration from legacy platform to headless architecture without losing sales
case_study.solution: Phased migration to Next.js + Shopify Plus with SEO preservation and redirects
